articles.title: State TV journalist who denounced Ukraine war flees Russia - The Guardian
articles.description: Marina Ovsyannikova ‘in Europe’ after leaving country with daughter after being placed on wanted list
articles.content:
A former Russian state television journalist who protested against Vladimir Putins invasion of Ukraine during a live broadcast has fled the country after being put on a wanted list.

articles.title: Lawmakers will try to oust UK PM Liz Truss this week: Report - The Indian Express
articles.description: Britain, engulfed in a political crisis, has lost three prime ministers since it voted to leave the European Union in 2016.
